content.text: Hi, how are you?
Hi, I'm doing well. Thank you for asking.
My pleasure. It is nice to meet you.
Same here. What do you do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play music.
Oh, that's great. I like to do those things too.
What do you like to read?
I love to read nonfiction books about history, science, and philosophy.
Oh, that's great. I love to read nonfiction books about science and philosophy.
That's amazing. I am a radio DJ, and I have a sweet tooth. Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets. I have a computer that is suitable for my needs.
That's great. I have to balance my work and studies, and it can be very challenging.
I understand. I had to do the same thing when I was in school.
My father used to be a cop.
That's great. My mother was a weightlifter.
Oh, that's awesome. I am a teacher in the future.
That's great. I want to be a teacher too.
My biggest challenge was accepting that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
That's great. I have to accept that my whining was getting in the way of my relationships.
I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones.
I cherish the time I spend with my loved ones too.
